articles.description: Huh! There's a surprise
articles.content: In 2009, developers Atomic Games and publishers Konami announced Six Days In Fallujah, a third-person shooter based on a real battle five years prior in the then-ongoing Iraq War. This proved controv… [+3440 chars]
